title: Human folly and destruction as seen in the plough and the stars
abstract: First and foremost, the writer would like to thank God for His blessing and grace so she can finish her thesis. Without Him, the writer cannot do it. Secondly, she vants to express her gratitude to her advisor, Drs. A. Gurito, who gives her a lot of contribution in doing her thesis. His guidance and suggestion help the writer to analyze OfCasey's The Ploush and the Stars. Besides her advisor, she is indebted to her co reader, Drs. Ribut Basuki, vho gives valuable suggestions. She also thanks all the lectur- ers of Faculty of Letters Petra Christian University for their valuable teaching during her study in this faculty. Finally, her sincere appreciation goes to her parents, vho supports her both spiritually and financially. Last but not least, she also thanks Dra. Mariana Untoro, her cousins Dina and Gunawan Prayogo, who teach her hov to use computer, and her best friends in this faculty.
subjects: ENGLISH DRAMA-20TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; O'CASEY, SEAN, 1880-1964. THE PLOUGH AND THE STAR-STUDY AND TEACHING
